<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> See Ye Not <S%G991><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These Things? <S%G5023><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Shall Be Left <S%G863><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Which <S%G3361><s%> Shall Not Be Thrown Down. <S%G2647><s%>

<S%G2521><s%> And As Was Sitting <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Olives <S%G1636><s%> Came To <S%G4334><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> ' Disciples <S%G2596><s%> Apart, <S%G2398><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> When <S%G4219><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Shall Be? <S%G2071><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What Is <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Thy <S%G4674><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Completion <S%G4930><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Age? <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Take Heed, <S%G991><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Mislead. <S%G4105><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> For Many <S%G1063><s%> Will Come <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSM, Christ; 5547 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ Many 4183 A-APM They Will Mislead. 4105 V-FAI-3P

<S%G3195><s%> But Ye Shall Be About <S%G1161><s%> To Hear Of <S%G191><s%> Wars <S%G4171><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rumours <S%G189><s%> Of Wars. <S%G4171><s%> <S%G3708><s%> See, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Disturbed; <S%G2360><s%> <S%G1163><s%> For It Is Necessary All These <S%G1063><s%> Things <S%G3956><s%> To Take Place, <S%G1096><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End. <S%G5056><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> But All <S%G1161><s%> These Are <S%G5023><s%> A Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of Throes. <S%G5604><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Will They Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Kill <S%G615><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Will Be <S%G2071><s%> Hated <S%G3404><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name. <S%G3450><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Ye Shall See <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abomination <S%G946><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Desolation, <S%G2050><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken Of <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Daniel <S%G1158><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> he Who <S%G3588><s%> Reads <S%G314><s%> Let Him Understand, <S%G3539><s%>

He <S%G3588><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1430><s%> Housetop <S%G3361><s%> Let Him Not Come Down <S%G2597><s%> To Take <S%G142><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> His House; <S%G846><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I Have Foretold It <S%G4280><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G5618><s%> For As <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lightning <S%G796><s%> Comes Forth <S%G1831><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> East <S%G395><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Appears <S%G5316><s%> As Far As The <S%G2193><s%> West, <S%G1424><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man. <S%G444><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> , Shall Pass Away, <S%G3928><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3056><s%> My Words <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Pass Away. <S%G3928><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Knows, <S%G1492><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> Only. <S%G3441><s%>
